duties_responsibilities.duty: Must possess strong communication skills, both verbal and written. Required to write copy and edit video into newscast and web formats. Ensure content of each newscast is clear, concise, and easily understandable by our viewers.
Responsible for determining story lineup and timing for each story or segment of newscast. Work with anchors and reporters on story selection, writing, and enterprise pieces.

Present information on wsaz.com immediately and as updates become available. Work with director to determine best use of graphics and coordination of live shots that will complement the stories included in each newscast.

education_certification.credential: BA in Journalism or related field preferred
